generatedTitle: why are police cars made of plastic

extractFactDictList.question: How many features of police vehicles are often overlooked?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One of the features that is often overlooked is the hard plastic back seats that are commonly found in police vehicles.

extractFactDictList.question: When did police use hard plastic back seats?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The use of hard plastic back seats in police cars dates back to the early 20th century, when metal cages were used to transport prisoners.
